About me

I’m a Finnish–French software engineer living in Jyväskylä, Finland. I work at Qvantel.

This blog is mainly about programming and software. For a bit of background, you can read a a meta post of sorts that describes the tone of the writings you will find on this site.

You can drop me an email or find me on Github.
